actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide that a beneficiary who dies shall (if otherwise qualified) be entitled to a prorated benefit for the month of his death.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Provides that an individual's entitlement to benefits under Title II (Old- Age, Survivors, and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act shall continue into the month of his or her death (or of the insured individual's death in the case of survivors' benefits) in an amount prorated to the number of days of the month which elapsed until the date of death.

titles.title: A bill to amend title II of the Social Security Act to provide that a beneficiary who dies shall (if otherwise qualified) be entitled to a prorated benefit for the month of his death.
